Articles.Content:
When I try to load up KSP 1.4.1, the game starts loading, but when the game is about 1/5 loaded, it crashes... I've tried closing out of almost all other windows, but it continuously crashes... If anyone has any ideas or has had the same issue in the past, please let me know! Any help is appreciated!  (note: I do have a lot of mods)

Oh, and the game didn't create a crash report...

Probably one or more of your mods are not compatible with 1.4.1 yet so will crash your game.

If I was you id move all the mods into a new folder and run KSP again to see.

I also use CKAN for my mods as you can easily see which ones are updated to the correct game version.

13 hours ago, HDLiggett said:

When I try to load up KSP 1.4.1, the game starts loading, but when the game is about 1/5 loaded, it crashes... I've tried closing out of almost all other windows, but it continuously crashes... If anyone has any ideas or has had the same issue in the past, please let me know! Any help is appreciated!  (note: I do have a lot of mods)

Oh, and the game didn't create a crash report...

 

 

Are you sure it's 64 bit mode?  Mine has "Launch Kerbal" and "Play in 32 bit mode" now.  I used to click and manually select 64 bit....  I was having the same problem, the game crashing hard on launch.  Then I looked closer.  Dunno why it is like that now.

Oh, that's interesting, it does say 32-bit now...

ill try moving my incompatible mods to a new folder. Thanks!
